summary: The customer service agent provided the customer with helpful information about how to set up and use their Contoso Wireless Other device. The agent explained that the device connects to the customer's phone via Bluetooth, and can be used to answer calls, check messages, and control the music player from up to 30 feet away. They also reminded the customer to keep the device charged and within 30 feet of their phone at all times. Finally, they offered assistance if the customer ever needed help with setup or use.
